SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.view.cli

Class CLIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.view.cli.CLIController
public class CLIController extends Object
This class is the controller of the CLI view. It is used to manage the data that the view needs to display during the game. The data gets updated by the controller of the model in the server, and then the view can access it through this controller.

    • initView

      public void initView(Objectives[] globalObjectives, ResourceCard[] cardsOnHand, ResourceCard[] cardsOnTable, String[] nicknames)
      This method initializes the view with the data that the view needs to display.
      Parameters:
      globalObjectives - : shared objectives of the match.
      cardsOnHand - : cards that the player has in his hand.
      cardsOnTable - : cards that are on the table and can be drawn.
      nicknames - : nicknames of the players in the match.

    • updateDecks

      public void updateDecks(ResourceCard resourceCardOnTop, GoldCard goldCardOnTop, int drawPos)
      This method updates the decks stored locally.
      Parameters:
      resourceCardOnTop - : resource card on top of the resource card deck.
      goldCardOnTop - : gold card on top of the gold card deck.
      drawPos - : position of the board card that has been drawn.

    • updatePoints

      public void updatePoints(int[] boardPoints, int[] globalPoints)
      Updates point counters locally.
      Parameters:
      boardPoints - : array of updated board points.
      globalPoints - : array of updated global points.

    • getStartingCard

      public StartingCard getStartingCard()

      public Objectives getSecretObjective()

    • getAvailablePositions

      public ArrayList<Integer[]> getAvailablePositions(boolean[][] playablePositions)
      Returns coordinates of the available positions on the board.
      Parameters:
      playablePositions - : matrix of booleans that represent the availability of the positions on the board.
      Returns:
      : an ArrayList of Integer arrays, each containing the coordinates of an available position.

    • checkIfValidPosition

      public boolean checkIfValidPosition(int x, int y, boolean[][] playablePositions)
      Checks if the position is valid.
      Parameters:
      x - : x coordinate of the position, representing the row.
      y - : y coordinate of the position, representing the column.
      playablePositions - : matrix of booleans that represent the availability of the positions on the board.
      Returns:
      : true if the position is valid, false otherwise.

    • getCorner

      public int getCorner(int x, int y, PlaceableCard[][] localBoard)
      Returns the corner over which the card placed in position x,y will be placed
      Parameters:
      x - : x coordinate of the position of the card that is yet to be placed,, representing the row.
      y - : y coordinate of the position of the card that is yet to be placed,, representing the column.
      localBoard - : matrix of PlaceableCard that represents the board.
      Returns:
      : an integer representing the corner over which the card placed in position x,y will be placed.

    • getCardCoords

      public int[] getCardCoords(int x, int y, PlaceableCard[][] localBoard)
      Returns the coordinates of the card already placed on the board that will be linked to the card yet to be placed.
      Parameters:
      x - : x coordinate of the position of the card that is yet to be placed, representing the row.
      y - : y coordinate of the position of the card that is yet to be placed, representing the column.
      localBoard - : matrix of PlaceableCard that represents the board.
      Returns:
      : coordinates of the already placed card.

    • updateDecksAndBoard

      public void updateDecksAndBoard(int position)
      Updates the decks and the drawable card on the table once a card has be drawn.
      Parameters:
      position - : position of the card that has been drawn.

    • getOccupiedPositions

      public ArrayList<Integer[]> getOccupiedPositions(PlaceableCard[][] localBoard)
      Returns coordinates of the occupied positions on the board.
      Parameters:
      localBoard - : matrix of PlaceableCard that represents the board.
      Returns:
      : an ArrayList of Integer arrays, each containing the coordinates of an occupied position.

    • setCardSide

      public void setCardSide(int card, boolean side)
      Sets the side of a card, either front ot back
      Parameters:
      card - : index of the card in the player's hand.
      side - : true if the card is set on the front side, false if it is set on the back side.
